commentList.content: Staff were very kind to switch my room as the one I got at first smelled odd. My favorite place to stay in Beijing.

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your recognition of citigo service! We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest and look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: I had a great stay at this hotel. The staff members were great and my room was cleaned everyday throughout my stay.

commentList.content: amazing as always, even during holidays the staff made sure to maintain all standards, highly recommend.

commentList.content: Good location and service. The room has all facilities, has a separate bathroom and toilet. The curtain is very good, it blocks the light well so you can get a good sleep. One advise for hotel would be dusting the area near the windows, it was slightly dusty when I stayed.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，並感謝您提出的寶貴意見，我們會採納並落實，期待您的每一次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. A person's 9 to 5 is not as good as a group of people's happy place. I hope that the hotel's rich and powerful shared living room will bring you more wonderful experiences, and thank you for your valuable opinions, we will adopt and implement them, and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content: It was a clean room, not spacious but a deal for the good location! I was happy with my stay and service.

commentList.content:
Very nice hotel.
Showers are great, bed is comfortable and service is super helpful.
The location is close to the metro, and shopping mall area.
Definedly a place to stay for a short visit to Beijing

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your recognition of citigo service! We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest and look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content:
I want to leave a special review for the staff of the hotel which was amazingly friendly and supportive.
They did everything they could to help us with any issue we had, and we had quite a few during this trip because of Covid19 Zero policy.
The staff was really outstanding helping us while keeping their smile and I feel very lucky to have stayed in this hotel.

Aside from that, the hotel installations are modern, good shower, good bed.

I will definedly come back to CitiGO hotel

great experience , very clean
rooms alittle small but overroll the stay was amazing

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your recognition of citigo service! We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest and look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: Always a nice experience at this hotel. Location is a big plus with many restaurants and a shopping mall a block away

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your trust and love of CitiGO. A one-person 9-to-5 is not as happy as a group of people. I hope that the rich and powerful shared living room of the hotel will bring you more wonderful experiences, and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content: Great hotel. Very suitable for foreigners. Friendly staff. The food was good and delicious. The location was great especially if you want to be close to the embassies. He hotel is very clean and offers a nice balance between affordability and quality. Will definitely stay again next time.

feedbackList.content: Dear guest, hello：Thank you for your recognition of citigo service! We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest and look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: Fantastic place to stay! The staff was helpful and friendly, the rooms were modern and clean, and the bed was soooo comfortable. There was a lot of noise in the hallway from people leaving and returning, which was annoying late at night. There was also a faint smell of smoke sometimes, because people didn't follow the no-smoking rule. I had booked this location because it was close to the subway, but then the subway line (just behind the hotel) was closed at this location, which was also quite irritating. Despite the negatives, I'd stay there again!

feedbackList.content: Dear guest, hello：Sorry for the bad stay experience, CitiGO values the opinions and suggestions of every guest, thank you for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect and improve to create a better stay experience for everyone.

commentList.content: Great place! Clean and nice. Unfortunately the nearby subway station was closed while I was there making getting around a bit annoying, but hopefully whatever renovations they're doing well be done soon!

feedbackList.content: We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused to your stay, the subway maintenance near the hotel is an irresistible factor of our hotel, it is expected to return to normal around March, looking forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: The front desk staffs looks so busy. They can't speak English. no explanation about hotel or area. They didn't provide a facilities that I need such as a tooth brush or comb etc. I don't have a breakfast because it is expensive. The subway station nearby is closed during the spring holidays.

feedbackList.content: Sorry to bring you a bad check-in experience. CitiGO attaches importance to the opinions and suggestions put forward by each guest, and thanks for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect and improve to create a better experience for everyone.

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your recognition of citigo service! We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest and look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: Lovely hotel and the hotel staff are very helpful and friendly... Although they can't speak much English  they could help me with many things and we could understand each other.. Would highly recommend this hotel... Also loved that we could do our own washing for free in their laundry area....

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your recognition of citigo service! We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest and look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: I loved this hotel. It was small, but it was perfect for me as a solo travel. Definitely would book again~

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your recognition of citigo service! We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest and look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content:
The staff was super helpful and friendly. I knew, that the room will be super small, but I was surprised how organized and well designed the place is. Everything has it's function and there are a lot of usefull details (wireless charger, phone holder next to the bed), which you won't find in other places , even at a higher price. I picked this hotel for the very convenient walking distance to Sanyuanqiao station, because I had an early flight next morning.
One small remark, in case you have to work: The space is really limited, and the hand wash basin is right next to the only availble desk space (not the best idea to have your laptop there)
Thumbs up! I will come again.

commentList.content: Went on a short trip with my family. Friendly and very helpful staff , no issues. Breakfast was decent for the price paid. Location is good. The hotel is modern and caters to a younger target market.

commentList.content: Great stay as per usual at CitiGo. Not our first time booking this hotel brand and we were not disappointed. However,the size of the hotel room was way smaller than last time (Guangzhou). So that came as a bit of a shock to use,but everything else was above par.

commentList.content: Possibly the best place to stay in Beijing. Close to Beijing Capital Airport (around 20-30 mins) and convenient to metro. Rooms are small but there is a perfect use of the interior space. (Kinda) international breakfast. Recommend with 5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️

commentList.content: Had a pleasant experience overall.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  The blackout window screens were particularly helpful sleeping late or taking a nap.  Location is good near the subway station.  No complaints.

commentList.content: That hotel is impressive. I will be using them every I travel somewhere, and they have a branch. However, be prepared to speak a lot of Chinese to the receptionist. Also, if you paid online, you won’t get paper fapiao from the hotel. I didn’t know that, and I think Trip.com should write it somewhere on the landing page. Besides this, CitiGo was the highlight of my experience in Beijing.

feedbackList.content: Sorry to give you a bad experience in the hotel. All the customers'opinions and suggestions are very important to CitiGO. Thank you for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect on and improve for you to create a better stay experience.

commentList.content: Returning again and again for easy access trips in the city, with a hotel that offers great location, breakfast and entertainment area in the lobby.

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your trust and love of citigo. commentList.content:
This is a great place for a good night of sleep for travelers that have business in the area. it is a great value stay. Breakfast is decent enough for both western and local standards.
The TV is a bit of a problem as it is all in Chinese without any international channels. if all you need is a good night's sleep and a decent breakfast in a nice clean place this hits all of the checkmarks.

feedbackList.content: Sorry to bring you a bad check-in experience. Citigo attaches importance to the opinions and suggestions put forward by each guest. Thank you for your trust and correction. We will constantly reflect and improve to create a better occupancy experience for everyone.

commentList.content: The  hotel was very clean, and the service is really good. Everything in the hotel including breakfast, staff were SUPER nice.... The location was not really convenient because not so many shops, malls around.

feedbackList.content: The hotel is located at the intersection of Sanyuan bridge on the East Third Ring Road, airport expressway and Jingmi Road, at the core of Sanyuan bridge Yansha business district, close to the third embassy area, and is the national fortress of Beijing. The transportation is convenient. The intersection of Metro Line 10 and airport express rail is 50m away from entrance / exit D of Sanyuanqiao metro station, which connects major core business districts in Beijing quickly. Everything is just for you to enjoy more considerate care, and sincerely look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: It is a small hotel, but very new and very nice. The gym is small but has everything you would need. There is laundry as well for those who stay longer. Breakfast is until noon, which is a plus. Also there is free wontons in the evening from 10-11, and they were good wontons too. There’s also free drinks included in the room, besides just water, which is another plus. Location is good, being right next to the subway and airport express. Only main negative for me is the room being small (though not a big deal for a short stay) and warm at night (so I opened the window for a bit).

commentList.content:
This hotel chain maintains the same standard no matter which city you are in. 
Reception was efficient and checkin was smooth.
The room: clean , has a mini fridge and a unique design. Not a huge space but sufficient for what you need when travelling.  There is a small mall, restaurant and  convenience store within walking distance from the hotel as well.

is very good for one person, also the style of the room is very modern and chic, overall my stay was a 9/10, would definitely stay here again.

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your trust and love of citigo. We are committed to making bath and sleep the best. From bath facilities to mattresses, we use international famous brands. ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
